entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
